articles.description: Delivery drivers and postal workers face threats of robberies and carjackings this holiday season, with assaults of postal workers reportedly surging.
articles.content:
Its the holiday season, which means delivery drivers will be hustling Christmas gifts with dangerous Grinches lurking.
Recent robberies and carjackings of delivery drivers have put a spotlight on th… [+7057 chars]

articles.title: Huawei is allegedly building a self-sufficient chip network using state investment fund - Engadget
articles.description: Huawei is allegedly building a self-sufficient chip network, with help from a Shenzhen city government investment fund.
articles.content: We've seen Huawei's surprising strides with its recent smartphones especially the in-house 7nm 5G processor within, but apparently the company has been working on something far more significant to by… [+2046 chars]

articles.title: GM execs boast about low costs of UAW contract, hand over billions to shareholders - WSWS
articles.description: GM CEO Mary Barra and Chief Financial Officer Paul Jacobson delivered the remarks nine days after the UAW bureaucracy pushed through a company-friendly contract, which was opposed by 47 percent of GM’s production workers.
articles.content:
Mary Barra [Photo by GM]
